description: Learn how to build your professional profile! The majority of people in the job market today do not know how to market and sell their skills. In this class, you’ll learn how to build the perfect resume & LinkedIn profile while marketing yourself on social media so employers will be knocking down your door! If you’re looking for your first job or looking to switch jobs this is the class for you. Your brand is your future and telling that story is the most important thing you can do. Take this course to learn how.
title: Build Your Professional Profile & Resume
